name: Vuybe
description: We’re on a mission to empower humanity to form deep meaningful connections. We've just launched our iOS app and are building a video networking platform.

team.title: Co-founder
team.name: George Pickett
team.bioHtml: I'm a Frontend engineer, passionate about solving problems. I dwell on the greater purpose of a product, then strive to build modern, elegant user interfaces

team.title: CEO
team.name: Stephen Choi
team.bioHtml: Founder @Vuybe • Worked at @Salesforce, @Ampush, and @Sofar Sounds • London Business School MBA2019• Berkeley Haas graduate

jobs.title: Backend Developer - Internship (3+ months)
jobs.description:
Vuybe is an iOS app that launched in January. Due to the pandemic, we're making a pivot to become a video speed networking platform.

Our team has founded advertising and real estate startups and worked at Goldman Sachs, Salesforce, Sofar Sounds, and Deutsche Bank. 

We are offering a 4 to 6 month internship for a highly motivated backend software engineer who will play a key role in helping us launch the next version of our product.

The ideal candidate is smart, relentless, and always ready to roll-up your sleeves to learn and solve problems. We're looking for someone who is not afraid to challenge our ideas and add their unique perspective.

Code you write in your first week will be used in production and you'll contribute to our frontend and backend bleeding edge tech stack. 

Upon successful internship, you'll have an opportunity to join us full-time.

jobs.title: Growth Marketer  - Internship (3 months)
jobs.description:
Vuybe is an iOS app that launched in January. Due to the pandemic, we're making a pivot to become a video speed networking platform. 

Our team has founded advertising and real estate startups and worked at Goldman Sachs, Salesforce, Sofar Sounds, and Deutsche Bank. 

We are offering a 4 to 6 month internship for a highly motivated grwoth hacker / marketer who will play a key role in helping us launch the next version of our product and make it go viral.

The ideal candidate is smart, relentless, and always ready to roll-up your sleeves to learn and solve problems. We're looking for someone who is not afraid to challenge our ideas and add their unique perspective.

You'll work directly with the founding team to implement fun and unconventional ideas starting from Day 1 of your internship.

Upon successful internship, you'll have an opportunity to join us full-time.

jobs.title: UI Designer - Internship (8 weeks)
jobs.description:
Vuybe is an iOS app that launched in January. Due to the pandemic, we're making a pivot to become a video speed networking platform.

Our team has founded advertising and real estate startups and worked at Goldman Sachs, Salesforce, Sofar Sounds, and Deutsche Bank. 

We are offering a 4 to 6 month internship for a highly motivated UI/UX designer who will play a key role in helping us launch the next version of our product.

The ideal candidate is unconventional, thinks outsisde the box, loves ideating, has a keen eye for UI design. We're looking for someone who is not afraid to challenge our ideas and add their unique perspective.

Our team has two frontend engineers who are eager to implement your deisgn into our product almost immediately.

Upon successful internship, you'll have an opportunity to join us full-time.
